changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table footballclub.team ( team_id int auto_increment primary key, team_name char(200) null, city char(200) null, country char(200) null, stadium char(200) null, coach char(200) null );

changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table footballclub.player_information ( player_id int auto_increment primary key, player_name char(200) not null, player_surname char(200) not null, country char(200) not null, age int(11) not null, position char(200) not null, team_id int(11), CONSTRAINT player_information_team_id foreign key (team_id) references team (team_id) );

changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table footballclub.game ( game_id int auto_increment primary key, team_id int(11), opponent_name char(200), result char(200) not null, goal_score int(11), goals_conceded int(11), yellow_card_score int(11), red_card_score int(11), CONSTRAINT game_team_id_fk foreign key (team_id) references team (team_id) );

changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table footballclub.game_player ( game_id int not null, player_id int not null, primary key (game_id, player_id), CONSTRAINT game_player_game_id_fk foreign key (game_id) references game (game_id), CONSTRAINT game_player_player_id_fk foreign key (player_id) references player_information (player_id) );

changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table footballclub.goal_score ( goal_id int auto_increment primary key, game_id_number int(11), goals_player int(11), goal_time int(11), CONSTRAINT goal_score_game_id foreign key (game_id_number) references game (game_id), CONSTRAINT goal_score_game_goal_player_id foreign key (goals_player) references player_information (player_id) );

changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table footballclub.goal_conceded ( goal_conceded_id int auto_increment primary key, game_id_number int(11), goalkeeper_id int(11), conceded_time int(11), CONSTRAINT goal_conceded_game_id foreign key (game_id_number) references game (game_id), CONSTRAINT goal_conceded_game_goal_player_id foreign key (goalkeeper_id) references player_information (player_id) );

changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table footballclub.yellow_card_score ( yellow_card_id int auto_increment primary key, game_id_number int(11), player_id int(11), card_time int(11), CONSTRAINT yellow_card_game_id foreign key (game_id_number) references game (game_id), CONSTRAINT yellow_card_player_game_id foreign key (player_id) references player_information (player_id) );

changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table footballclub.red_card_score ( red_card_id int auto_increment primary key, game_id_number int(11), player_id int(11), card_time int(11), CONSTRAINT red_card_game_id foreign key (game_id_number) references game (game_id), CONSTRAINT red_card_player_game_id foreign key (player_id) references player_information (player_id) );

changeSet.author: Sergey060890
changeSet.sql: create table footballclub.substitution ( substitution_id int auto_increment primary key, game_id_number int(11), player_id_in int(11), player_id_out int(11), subs_time int(11), CONSTRAINT substitution_game_id foreign key (game_id_number) references game (game_id), CONSTRAINT substitution_player_in_game_id foreign key (player_id_in) references player_information (player_id) );
